cards.name: Brace
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Dexterity.
At the end of this turn, lose 3 (5) Dexterity.

cards.name: Throwing Stars
cards.description: Deal 8 (12) damage to a random enemy for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Cautious Instincts
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, gain 3 Block for each attack in your hand.

cards.name: Hack and Slash
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
Whenever you discard a card, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Survival Pack
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
You may not play any attacks this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blight
cards.description:
If the enemy does not have Poison, Apply 12 (16) Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

mods.name: The Silent Booster Pack
mods.description:
This mod adds 10 new cards to The Silent's card pool: 
- Brace (Common)
- Destroyer (Common)
- Frenzied Stab (Common)
- Throwing Stars (Common)
- Cautious Instincts (Uncommon)
- Hack and Slash (Uncommon)
- Sidestep (Uncommon)
- Survival Pack (Uncommon)
- Blight (Rare)
- Sleight of Hand (Rare)
